document.full_text: the trustee for the brokerage arm of lehman brothers holdings inc  is entitled to $4 billion in margin assets that have been the subject of a long-running legal fight with barclays plc , a bankruptcy judge said on monday.
document.title: judge: lehman brokerage entitled to margin assets
lines_and_colors: the trustee for the brokerage arm of lehman brothers holdings inc  is entitled to $4 billion in margin assets that have been the subject of a long-running legal fight with barclays plc , a bankruptcy judge said on monday.
